title: $:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList
name: Task List
description: A powerful, customizable and reusable todo list.
author: Maurycy Zarzycki
text:
{"tiddlers":{"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/history":{"title":"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/history","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"* ''1.0.14'' -- Added a way to pass custom filters to filter out items from the list * ''1.0.13'' -- Fixed cleanup JS being overriden + added support for renaming the task list * ''1.0.12'' -- Enter can now be used to save a new field * ''1.0.11'' -- CSS Class in builder now proactively reports of error in the filter * ''1.0.10'' -- HTML and CSS cleanup to remove excessive HTML structures * ''1.0.9'' -- Disallow using built-in field IDs * ''1.0.8'' -- Added UI options to builder; only show delete on checked options * ''1.0.7'' -- Added tooltips to all buttons * ''1.0.6'' -- Removed redundant logging actions + wrapped the task list in a div * ''1.0.5'' -- Fields and Items are now stored in `$:/tasklist/` prefixed tiddlers to not be available in search * ''1.0.4'' -- Fixed broken saving for Select (List) * ''1.0.3'' -- Table for sorting options now takes whole width and has larger input * ''1.0.2'' -- Fixed a bug where it was impossible to edit a task list outside its tiddler * ''1.0.1'' -- Fixed an error being triggered when using `zoomin` story view * ''1.0.0'' -- Official release * ''0.0.1'' -- First version"},"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/icon":{"title":"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/icon","text":"","type":"image/png"},"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/license":{"title":"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/license","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"This plugin is licensed under the MIT license. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE AUTHORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR OTHER LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING FROM, OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR OTHER DEALINGS IN THE SOFTWARE."},"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/readme","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"[[Github|https://github.com/EvidentlyCube/TW5-PluginShowcase/tree/main/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TW5-TaskList]] ---- ! Features A very powerful Task List/Todo plugin where you can customize almost any aspect of it: * Define your own fields ** Simple text input fields ** Select powered by Data tiddlers or list fields * How the list items are displayed * Sorting * CSS class applied to each element Additionally you can make it so that each task list item has custom tags or fields added on save for maximum power. ''To use'' just create a new tiddler with the tag `TaskList` and use the built-in builder."},"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/Actions/builder-add-field":{"title":"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/Actions/builder-add-field","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\define action-add-new-field() <$let new-field={{{ [get[new-field]] }}} new-field-caption={{{ [get[new-field-caption]] }}} new-title={{{ [[$:/tasklist/]addsuffixaddsuffix[/Field]addsuffixaddsuffix[.edit]] }}} is-new-field-empty={{{ [match[]then[1]else[0]] }}} is-new-caption-empty={{{ [match[]then[1]else[0]] }}} is-unique-field={{{ [all[tiddlers]tag[TaskList/Field]field:parentget[field-name]matchthen[1]else[0]] }}} is-field-title-used={{{ [is[tiddler]then[1]else[0]] }}} is-reserved-field={{{ [list[$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/Builder/reserved-fields]matchthen[1]else[0]] }}} error-count={{{ [match[1]] =[match[1]] =[match[1]] =[match[1]] =[match[1]] +[count[]] }}} > <$list filter="[match[0]]" variable="ignore"> <$action-createtiddler $basetitle=<> tags="TaskList/Field" parent=<> priority=<> caption=<> field-name=<> field-type="text" field-width="10" /> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> new-field="" new-field-caption="" /> \end"},"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/Actions/builder-cancel-edit":{"title":"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/Actions/builder-cancel-edit","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\define action-cancel-edit() <$list filter="[all[tiddlers]tag[TaskList/Field]field:parent]"> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-close-tiddler" param=<>/> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-close-tiddler" param=<>/> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/> \end"},"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/Actions/builder-delete-field":{"title":"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/Actions/builder-delete-field","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\define action-delete-field() <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/> \end"},"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/Actions/builder-move-field-down":{"title":"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/Actions/builder-move-field-down","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\define action-move-field-down() <$let priority={{!!priority}} next-priority={{{ [all[tiddlers]tag[TaskList/Field]field:parent{!!parent}get[priority]compare:integer:gtminall[]] }}} next-tiddler={{{ [all[tiddlers]tag[TaskList/Field]field:parent{!!parent}field:priority] }}} > <$list filter="[is[tiddler]]" variable="ignore"> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> priority=<>/> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> priority=<>/> \end"},"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/Actions/builder-move-field-up":{"title":"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/Actions/builder-move-field-up","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\define action-move-field-up() <$let priority={{!!priority}} prev-priority={{{ [all[tiddlers]tag[TaskList/Field]field:parent{!!parent}get[priority]compare:integer:ltmaxall[]] }}} prev-tiddler={{{ [all[tiddlers]tag[TaskList/Field]field:parent{!!parent}field:priority] }}} > <$list filter="[is[tiddler]]" variable="ignore"> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> priority=<>/> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> priority=<>/> \end"},"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/Actions/builder-save-edit":{"title":"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/Actions/builder-save-edit","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\define action-save-edit() <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-close-tiddler" $param=<>/> <$list filter="[all[tiddlers]tag[TaskList/Field]field:parent]"> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-close-tiddler" $param=<>/> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/> <$list filter="[all[tiddlers]tag[TaskList/Field]field:parent]"> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> parent=<> /> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-rename-tiddler" from=<> to={{{ [all[current]removesuffix[.edit]] }}} /> <$action-deletefield $tiddler=<> draft.of draft.title /> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-rename-tiddler" from=<> to=<> /> \end"},"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/Builder/field-edit":{"title":"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/Builder/field-edit","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":" <$text text={{!!caption}}/>
(<$text text={{!!field-name}}/>)
Type:
<$select field="field-type">

<$text text={{{ [[$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/Builder/field-type-descriptions]getindex{!!field-type}] }}}/>

<$transclude tiddler={{{ [[$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/Builder/Inputs/]addsuffix{!!field-type}] }}} /> <$let title-escaped={{{ [all[current]addprefixaddsuffix] }}}> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="Move field up" actions=<>> {{$:/core/images/up-arrow}} <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="Move field down" actions=<>> {{$:/core/images/down-arrow}} <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="Delete field" actions=<>> {{$:/core/images/cancel-button}} "},"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/builder-header-bar":{"title":"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/builder-header-bar","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="Discard changes to this TaskList" aria-label="cancel" actions=<>> {{$:/core/images/cancel-button}} <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="Save changes to this TaskList" aria-label="ok" actions=<>> {{$:/core/images/done-button}}

<$text text={{{ [all[current]removesuffix[.edit]] }}}/> --- Editing TaskList

"},"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/Components/builder-new-field":{"title":"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/Components/builder-new-field","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"<$keyboard key="enter" class="ec_tl-builder-new-field" actions=<>>

Add a new field

''Caption:'' <$edit-text tiddler=<> field="new-field-caption" placeholder="Field name" />

How this field is displayed in the input list

''ID:'' <$edit-text tiddler=<> field="new-field" placeholder="Field Name" />

Actual tiddler field name used to store this field

<$let new-field={{{ [get[new-field]] }}} new-field-caption={{{ [get[new-field-caption]] }}} new-title={{{ [addsuffix[/Field/]addsuffix] }}} is-new-field-empty={{{ [match[]then[1]else[0]] }}} is-new-caption-empty={{{ [match[]then[1]else[0]] }}} is-unique-field={{{ [all[tiddlers]tag[TaskList/Field]field:parentget[field-name]matchthen[1]else[0]] }}} is-field-title-used={{{ [is[tiddler]then[1]else[0]] }}} is-reserved-field={{{ [list[$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/Builder/reserved-fields]matchthen[1]else[0]] }}} error-count={{{ [match[1]] =[match[1]] =[match[1]] =[match[1]] =[match[1]] +[count[]] }}} > <$list filter="[match[1]]">

Field ID must not be empty.

<$list filter="[match[1]]">

Field Caption must not be empty.

<$list filter="[match[1]]">

A field with this ID already exists.

<$list filter="[match[1]]">

There already exists a tiddler <$link to=<>><$text text=<>/>.

<$list filter="[match[1]]">

<$text text=<>/> is a built-in field name, please use a different ID.

<$button actions=<> disabled={{{ [!match[0]then[yes]] }}}> Add new field "},"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/builder-tab-template":{"title":"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/builder-tab-template","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"<$tiddler tiddler=<>> <$transclude mode="inline" /> "},"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/builder-template-css-class":{"title":"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/builder-template-css-class","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","caption":"CSS Class","text":"

CSS Class

Do you want a certain CSS class to be applied to task items? Provide the filter that returns the class below. The current tiddler is the task item, so you can use Text Reference to take value from fields.

<$edit-text tiddler=<> tag="textarea" class="ec_tl-template-edit" field="tl-class-filter"/> <$list filter={{{ [get[tl-class-filter]] }}}>

<$list filter={{{ [prefix[Filter error]]}}}> <>

"},"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/builder-template-fields":{"title":"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/builder-template-fields","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","caption":"Fields","text":"

Fields editor

What fields do you want to have in this task list?

<$list filter="[all[tiddlers]tag[TaskList/Field]field:parentnsort[priority]]"> {{||$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/Builder/field-edit}}
Name (ID) Field details Actions
{{||$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/Components/builder-new-field}}"},"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/builder-template-sorting":{"title":"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/builder-template-sorting","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","caption":"Sorting","text":"\define action-rebuild-sorting-filters() <$let simple-sort-base-done="[all[tiddlers]tag[TaskList/Item]field:parentfield:_is-done[1]%1%sort[%2%]]" simple-sort-base-not-done="[all[tiddlers]tag[TaskList/Item]field:parent!field:_is-done[1]%1%sort[%2%]]" complex-sort-base-done="[all[tiddlers]tag[TaskList/Item]field:parentfield:_is-done[1]]" complex-sort-base-not-done="[all[tiddlers]tag[TaskList/Item]field:parent!field:_is-done[1]]" sort-field={{{ [get[tl-sort-field]] }}} sort-filter={{{ [get[tl-sort-filter]] }}} excl="!" > <$list filter="[field:tl-sort-mode[ascending]]"> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $field="tl-filter-not-done" $value={{{ [search-replace[%1%],[]search-replace[%2%],] }}} /> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $field="tl-filter-done" $value={{{ [search-replace[%1%],[]search-replace[%2%],] }}} /> <$list filter="[field:tl-sort-mode[descending]]"> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $field="tl-filter-not-done" $value={{{ [search-replace[%1%],[!]search-replace[%2%],] }}} /> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $field="tl-filter-done" $value={{{ [search-replace[%1%],[!]search-replace[%2%],] }}} /> <$list filter="[field:tl-sort-mode[filter]]"> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $field="tl-filter-not-done" $value={{{ [addsuffix[ ]addsuffix] }}} /> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $field="tl-filter-done" $value={{{ [addsuffix[ ]addsuffix] }}} /> \end

Sorting

In what order should the items in the task list appear?

<$radio tiddler=<> field="tl-sort-mode" value="ascending" actions=<>> Simple Ascending
<$radio tiddler=<> field="tl-sort-mode" value="descending" actions=<>> Simple Descending

Provide the field name by which to sort the task list items.

<$edit-text tiddler=<> class="ec_tl-template-edit" field="tl-sort-field" inputActions=<>/>
<$radio tiddler=<> field="tl-sort-mode" value="filter" actions=<>> Custom filter

Provide a custom filter run or runs for sorting.

<$edit-text tiddler=<> class="ec_tl-template-edit" field="tl-sort-filter" inputActions=<>/> <$list filter={{{ [get[tl-filter-done]] }}}>

<$list filter={{{ [prefix[Filter error]]}}}> <>

"},"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/builder-template-task-view":{"title":"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/builder-template-task-view","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","caption":"Template","text":"

Task template

How do you want items in the task list to look? A default template is used if you leave this empty.

<$edit-text tiddler=<> tag="textarea" class="ec_tl-template-edit" field="tl-template"/>"},"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/builder-template-ui":{"title":"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/builder-template-ui","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","caption":"UI","text":"

UI

Customize various interface options.

<$checkbox tiddler=<> field="tl-delete-checked" checked="1"> Show delete only on checked items.

"},"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/Builder/reserved-fields":{"title":"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/Builder/reserved-fields","type":"application/x-tiddler-dictionary","list":"bag created creator modified modifier permissions recipe revision tags text title type uri"},"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/Builder/field-type-descriptions":{"title":"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/Builder/field-type-descriptions","text":"text: Takes simple text as an input hidden-field: Is not displayed, sets a field to a static value hidden-tag: Is not displayed, adds a specific tag to the task item select-data: Shows a dropdown taking keys and values from a data dictionary select-data-vals: Shows a dropdown taking values from a data dictionary select-list: Shows a dropdown taking values from a tiddler's list field","type":"application/x-tiddler-dictionary"},"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/Builder/Inputs/hidden-field":{"title":"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/Builder/Inputs/hidden-field","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"
Field name:
<$edit-text field="meta-name"/>

Name of the field to set the task item.

Field value:
<$edit-text field="meta-value"/>

Value to set the field in the task item to.

"},"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/Builder/Inputs/hidden-tag":{"title":"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/Builder/Inputs/hidden-tag","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"
Tag name:
<$edit-text field="meta-tag"/>

Name of the tag to add to the task item.

"},"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/Builder/Inputs/select-data-vals":{"title":"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/Builder/Inputs/select-data-vals","text":"
Source tiddler:
<$edit-text field="meta-source"/>

Name of the tiddler that contains the data.

<$list filter="[all[current]get[meta-source]count[]match[0]]">

No source tiddler specified.

<$list filter="[all[current]get[meta-source]!is[tiddler]count[]!match[0]]">

The specified source tiddler was not found.

<$list filter="[all[current]get[meta-source]indexes[]count[]match[0]]">

The specified source tiddler has no data indexes.

"},"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/Builder/Inputs/select-data":{"title":"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/Builder/Inputs/select-data","text":"
Source tiddler:
<$edit-text field="meta-source"/>

Name of the tiddler that contains the data.

<$list filter="[all[current]get[meta-source]count[]match[0]]">

No source tiddler specified.

<$list filter="[all[current]get[meta-source]!is[tiddler]count[]!match[0]]">

The specified source tiddler was not found.

<$list filter="[all[current]get[meta-source]indexes[]count[]match[0]]">

The specified source tiddler has no data indexes.

"},"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/Builder/Inputs/select-list":{"title":"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/Builder/Inputs/select-list","text":" Source tiddler: <$edit-text field="meta-source"/>

Name of the tiddler that contains the data.

<$list filter="[all[current]get[meta-source]count[]match[0]]">

No source tiddler specified.

<$list filter="[all[current]get[meta-source]!is[tiddler]count[]!match[0]]">

The specified source tiddler was not found.

<$list filter="[all[current]get[meta-source]enlist-input[]count[]match[0]]">

The specified source tiddler has nothing in its `list` field.

"},"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/Builder/Inputs/text":{"title":"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/Builder/Inputs/text","text":" Field Width: <$edit-text field="field-width" type="number" size="4"/>

Width of the input field in characters.

"},"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/builder-story-filter":{"title":"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/builder-story-filter","tags":"$:/tags/StoryTiddlerTemplateFilter","list-before":"$:/config/StoryTiddlerTemplateFilters/draft","text":"[tag[TaskList]suffix[.edit]then[$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/builder-template]] "},"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/builder-template":{"title":"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/builder-template","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\import [[$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/Actions/builder-add-field]] [[$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/Actions/builder-save-edit]] [[$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/Actions/builder-cancel-edit]] [[$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/Actions/builder-delete-field]] [[$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/Actions/builder-move-field-up]] [[$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/Actions/builder-move-field-down]] \define toggle-preview() <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> tl-preview={{{ [field:tl-preview[original]then[new]else[original]] }}} /> \end \whitespace trim <$let tid=<> tid-base={{{ [removesuffix[.edit]] }}} temp=<> next-priority={{{ [all[tiddlers]tag[TaskList/Field]field:parentget[priority]maxall[]add[1]else[1]] }}} >
{{||$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/builder-header-bar}}
<$macrocall $name="tabs" tabsList="[[$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/builder-template-fields]] [[$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/builder-template-task-view]] [[$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/builder-template-sorting]] [[$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/builder-template-css-class]] [[$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/builder-template-ui]]" default="$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/builder-template-fields" state="$:/temp/task-list" template="$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/builder-tab-template" />
<$list filter="[!field:tl-preview[original]]">

Preview (new | <$button actions=<> class="tc-btn-invisible ec_tl-preview-btn">original)

Currently previewing the edited version of the Task List.

<$macrocall $name="ec-task-list" tiddler=<>/> <$list filter="[field:tl-preview[original]]">

Preview (<$button actions=<> class="tc-btn-invisible ec_tl-preview-btn">new | original)

Currently previewing the version of the Task List without any changes.

<$macrocall $name="ec-task-list" tiddler=<>/>
"},"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/cleanup.js":{"title":"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/cleanup.js","text":"/*\ title: $:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/cleanup.js type: application/javascript module-type: startup Cleans up data after a TaskList is removed \*/ (function(){ /*jslint node: false, browser: true */ /*global $tw: false */ "use strict"; // Export name and synchronous status exports.name = "evidentlycube-tasklist-cleanup"; exports.after = ["windows"]; exports.synchronous = true; exports.startup = function() { if ($tw.node) { return; } var isBusy = false; $tw.hooks.addHook("th-saving-tiddler", function(newTiddler, oldTiddler) { if ( !oldTiddler || !oldTiddler.fields.tags || !oldTiddler.fields['draft.of'] || !oldTiddler.fields['draft.of'].substr(-5) === '.edit' || oldTiddler.fields.tags.indexOf('TaskList') === -1 || newTiddler.fields['draft.of'] || isBusy ) { return newTiddler; } isBusy = true; var newTitle = newTiddler.fields.title; var oldTitle = oldTiddler.fields['draft.of']; var oldEditTitle = newTitle + ".edit"; var newEditTitle = newTitle + ".edit"; var fields = $tw.wiki.filterTiddlers("[all[tiddlers]tag[TaskList/Field]]"); var items = $tw.wiki.filterTiddlers("[all[tiddlers]tag[TaskList/Item]]"); for (let i = 0; i < fields.length; i++) { var fieldTiddler = $tw.wiki.getTiddler(fields[i]); if (fieldTiddler.fields.parent === oldTitle) { $tw.wiki.addTiddler(new $tw.Tiddler(fieldTiddler, {parent: newTitle})); } else if (fieldTiddler.fields.parent === oldEditTitle) { $tw.wiki.addTiddler(new $tw.Tiddler(fieldTiddler, {parent: newEditTitle})); } } for (let i = 0; i < items.length; i++) { var itemTiddler = $tw.wiki.getTiddler(items[i]); if (itemTiddler.fields.parent === oldTitle) { $tw.wiki.addTiddler(new $tw.Tiddler(itemTiddler, {parent: newTitle})); } else if (itemTiddler.fields.parent === oldEditTitle) { $tw.wiki.addTiddler(new $tw.Tiddler(itemTiddler, {parent: newEditTitle})); } } isBusy = false; return newTiddler; }); $tw.hooks.addHook("th-deleting-tiddler", function(tiddler) { if ( !tiddler || tiddler.fields.tags.indexOf('TaskList') === -1 || tiddler.fields.title.substr(-5) === '.edit' || isBusy ) { return; } isBusy = true; var title = tiddler.fields.title; var editTitle = title + '.edit'; var fields = $tw.wiki.filterTiddlers("[all[tiddlers]tag[TaskList/Field]]"); var items = $tw.wiki.filterTiddlers("[all[tiddlers]tag[TaskList/Item]]"); for (let i = 0; i < fields.length; i++) { var fieldTiddler = $tw.wiki.getTiddler(fields[i]); if (fieldTiddler.fields.parent === title || fieldTiddler.fields.parent === editTitle) { $tw.wiki.deleteTiddler(fieldTiddler.fields.title); } } for (let i = 0; i < items.length; i++) { var itemTiddler = $tw.wiki.getTiddler(items[i]); if (itemTiddler.fields.parent === title) { $tw.wiki.deleteTiddler(itemTiddler.fields.title); } } $tw.wiki.deleteTiddler(editTitle); isBusy = false; }); }; })(); ","type":"application/javascript","module-type":"startup"},"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/Actions/core-cancel-item-edit":{"title":"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/Actions/core-cancel-item-edit","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\define action-cancel-item-edit() <$action-setfield _is-editing="0"/> \end"},"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/Actions/core-save-edited-item":{"title":"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/Actions/core-save-edited-item","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\define action-save-edited-item() <$let item-tid=<>> <$action-setfield _is-editing="0"/> <$list filter="[all[tiddlers]tag[TaskList/Field]field:parent]"> <$transclude tiddler={{{ [[$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/Actions/core-save-field-]addsuffix{!!field-type}] }}}/> \end"},"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/Actions/core-save-field-hidden-field":{"title":"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/Actions/core-save-field-hidden-field","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"<$action-setfield <$list filter="[field:tl-template[]]" emptyMessage={{{ [get[tl-template]] }}} variable="ignore"> <$list filter="[all[tiddlers]tag[TaskList/Field]field:parent]" variable="field" counter="field-counter"> <$let field-name={{{ [get[field-name]] }}}> <$list filter="[match[no]]">--- <$text text={{{ [all[current]getelse[n/a]] }}}/>
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible ec_tl-button" actions=<> tooltip="Edit this item" > {{$:/core/images/edit-button}} <$list filter="[field:tl-delete-checked[1]then[0]else[1]] [get[_is-done]then[1]else[0]] +[sum[]match[1]]" variable="ignore"> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible ec_tl-button" tooltip="Delete this item" > <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/> {{$:/core/images/close-button}}
"},"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/core-macro":{"title":"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/core-macro","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","tags":"$:/tags/Macro","text":" \define ec-task-list(tiddler, custom-filter:"") \whitespace trim <$importvariables filter=" [[$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/Actions/core-save-item]] [[$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/Actions/core-start-item-edit]] [[$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/Actions/core-save-edited-item]] [[$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/Actions/core-cancel-item-edit]] [[$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/Actions/core-start-tasklist-edit]] " > <$let currentTiddler=<<__tiddler__>> tid=<<__tiddler__>> tid-edit={{{ [addsuffix[.edit]] }}} tid-base={{{ [removesuffix[.edit]else] }}} temp=<> custom-filter={{{ [<__custom-filter__>compare:string:ne[0]] }}} filter-not-done={{{ [{!!tl-filter-not-done}addsuffix[ ]addsuffix] }}} filter-done={{{ [{!!tl-filter-done}addsuffix[ ]addsuffix] }}} >
slugify[]addprefix[tasklist-]] +[join[ ]] }}}> {{||$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/core-input-row}}
<$list filter=<> > <$list filter="[!prefix[Filter error:]]" emptyMessage=<> > <$transclude tiddler={{{ [all[current]field:_is-editing[1]then[$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/core-item-edit]else[$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/core-item]] }}}/>
<$list filter=<> > <$list filter="[!prefix[Filter error:]]" emptyMessage=<> > <$transclude tiddler={{{ [all[current]field:_is-editing[1]then[$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/core-item-edit]else[$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/core-item]] }}}/>
\end"},"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/draft-body-filter":{"title":"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/draft-body-filter","tags":"$:/tags/EditTemplateBodyFilter","list-after":"$:/config/EditTemplateBodyFilters/canonical-uri","text":"[tag[TaskList]then[$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/draft-template]] "},"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/draft-template":{"title":"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/draft-template","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"
<$list filter="[all[current]get[draft.of]is[tiddler]]" emptyMessage="""

You're creating a new Task List

You can access the TaskList editor after you save this Tiddler. """>

Be careful!

You are editing an existing TaskList. Please do not edit any fields prefixed with `tl-`. If you rename this Task List all the fields and items will be updated to point to the newly named Task List.
"},"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/action-init":{"title":"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/action-init","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\define __action-initialize-new-list() <$action-createtiddler $basetitle={{{ [addsuffix[.edit]] }}} $overwrite="yes" tags="TaskList" > <$let content='<>' content-replaced={{{ [search-replace[%%],] }}} > <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text=<> draft.of=<> draft.title=<> tl-filter-done="[all[tiddlers]tag[TaskList/Item]field:parentfield:_is-done[1]sort[text]]" tl-filter-not-done="[all[tiddlers]tag[TaskList/Item]field:parent!field:_is-done[1]sort[text]]" tl-sort-mode="ascending" tl-sort-field="text" tl-sort-filter=":sort[{!!text}]" caption={{{ [addsuffix[ (TaskList)]] }}} /> <$action-createtiddler $basetitle={{{ [[$:/tasklist/]addsuffixaddsuffix[/Field/Text.edit]] }}} tags="TaskList/Field" parent=<> priority=1 caption="Text" field-name="text" field-type="text" field-width="10" /> <$action-createtiddler $basetitle={{{ [[$:/tasklist/]addsuffixaddsuffix[/Item]] }}} tags="TaskList/Item" parent=<> text="Make an apple pie" /> <$action-createtiddler $basetitle={{{ [[$:/tasklist/]addsuffixaddsuffix[/Item]] }}} tags="TaskList/Item" parent=<> text="Buy groceries" /> <$action-createtiddler $basetitle={{{ [[$:/tasklist/]addsuffixaddsuffix[/Item]] }}} tags="TaskList/Item" parent=<> text="Lookup the definition of 'scratch'" _is-done="1" /> <$action-createtiddler $basetitle={{{ [[$:/tasklist/]addsuffixaddsuffix[/Item]] }}} tags="TaskList/Item" parent=<> text="Invent the universe" _is-done="1" /> <$action-navigate $to=<>/> \end"},"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/list-body-filter":{"title":"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/list-body-filter","tags":"$:/tags/ViewTemplateBodyFilter","list-after":"$:/config/ViewTemplateBodyFilters/system","text":"[tag[TaskList]then[$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/list-template]] "},"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/list-template":{"title":"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/list-template","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\import [[$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/action-init]] \define action-reopen-editor() <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-close-tiddler" param=<>/> <$action-navigate $to=<> scroll="yes"/> \end <$let tid=<> tid-edit={{{ [addsuffix[.edit]] }}} fields-count={{{ [all[tiddlers]tag[TaskList/Field]field:parentcount[]] }}} > <$list filter="[!is[tiddler]]" variable="ignore" emptyMessage=""" You're already editing this list - <$button actions=<>>Open Editor """> <$list filter="[match[0]]" variable="ignore"> <$button actions=<<__action-initialize-new-list>>> Initialize a new Task List <$list filter="[!match[0]]" variable="ignore"> <$macrocall $name="ec-task-list" tiddler=<>/> "},"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/monkeypatch.js":{"title":"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/monkeypatch.js","text":"/*\ title: $:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/monkeypatch.js type: application/javascript module-type: startup Fixes SelectWidget classes not updating when the dynamic class source has changed, only triggers for versions pre 5.2.4 Fixes issue #6986 \*/ (function(){ /*jslint node: false, browser: true */ /*global $tw: false */ "use strict"; // Export name and synchronous status exports.name = "evidentlycube-tasklist-cleanup"; exports.after = ["windows"]; exports.synchronous = true; exports.startup = function() { var version = $tw.version.split('.'); if ($tw.node || version[0] > 5 || version[1] > 2 || version[1] > 3) { return; } var selectWidget = require("$:/core/modules/widgets/select.js"); var originalRefresh = selectWidget.select.prototype.refresh; selectWidget.select.prototype.refresh = function(changedTiddlers) { if(this.computeAttributes().class) { this.selectClass = this.getAttribute("class"); this.getSelectDomNode().setAttribute("class",this.selectClass); } originalRefresh.call(this, changedTiddlers); } }; })(); ","type":"application/javascript","module-type":"startup"},"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/Style":{"title":"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TaskList/Style","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":".ec_tl-draft { background-color: <>; border: 1px solid <>; padding: 1em; margin: 1em; } .ec_tl-draft h1 { margin-top: 0; } .ec_tl-muted { font-style: italic; opacity: 0.6; } .ec_tl-error { font-style:italic; color: #F00; margin: 0; } .ec_tl-builder-field, .ec_tl-builder-new-field { border: 1px solid #EEE; background: #F8F8F8; padding: 0 1em 1em; margin-bottom: 1em; flex: 0 1 300px; } .ec_tl-builder-new-field { background: #F8F8FF; } .ec_tl-builder-field-edit { width: 100%; } .ec_tl-builder-field-edit header{ font-weight: bold; } .ec_tl-builder-field-edit p{ margin: 0; } .ec_tl-builder-field-edit input, .ec_tl-builder-field-edit select{ width: 100%; } .ec_tl-hint{ font-style:italic; color: #888; margin: 0; } .ec_tl-error { font-style:italic; color: #F00; margin: 0; } .ec_tl-field-cell { vertical-align: top; } .ec_tl-inputs { width: 100%; display: flex; gap: 1em; margin-bottom: 0.5em; } .ec_tl-inputs div:last-child { white-space: nowrap; flex-shrink: 0; } input.ec_tl-input, select.ec_tl-input { border: none; border-bottom: 1px solid #888; flex-grow: 1; flex-shrink: 1; min-width: 0; } select.ec_tl-input option { color: black; } select.ec_tl-input option:first-child, .ec_tl-input.ec_tl-placeholder { color: #888; } .ec_tl-preview-btn { color: <>; } .ec_tl-template-edit { width: 100%; resize: vertical; font-family: monospace; } .ec_tl-button { flex-shrink: 0; } .ec_tl-inputs .ec_tl-button svg { width: 1.5em; height: 1.5em; } button.ec_tl-button svg { fill: <>; } .ec_tl-button:hover svg { fill: <>; } .ec_tl-filler { flex-grow: 1; } .ec_tl-tasks { margin-bottom: 1em; } .ec_tl-task { display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 0.3em; padding: 0 0.5em; } .ec_tl-task.ec_tl-checked { text-decoration: line-through; } .ec_tl-task:hover { outline: 1px solid rgb(0, 0, 0, 0.2); } .ec_tl-task:hover .ec_tl-button svg { fill: <>; } .ec_tl-check { width: 16px; height: 16px; display: block; } .ec_tl-check input { width: 16px; height: 16px; vertical-align: baseline; } .ec_tl-task-editing { margin: 0.2em 0; } .ec_tl-preview { border: 1px solid black; border-radius: 1em; padding: 0 1em; } .ec_tl-preview .ec_tl-container{ padding: 0 1em; }"}}}
